groups.name: mill.data.sql
groups.description: SQL settings for data query parsing and execution. Configures sql dialect and sql conventions for parser. Conventions will be applied for client sql

groups.name: mill.data.backend
groups.description: Data backend selection and backend settings.

values.description: Backend type used by mill application. Only one backend can be active at a time.
Backend type used by mill application. Only one backend can be active at a time.
